subject: We accepted your loan request
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire THIS NIGHT):
$316,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!!
http://urflkght.com/
